heading.name: Age and Gender Histogram Report
heading.definition: Age and Gender Histogram report (5 year intervals)
heading.notes: Age and Gender Histogram report (5 year intervals)

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.gender = 'M' AND (0 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() ) < 20 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0) AS "M0-19", IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.gender = 'M' AND (20 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() ) < 60 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0) AS "M20-59", IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.gender = 'M' AND (60 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() ) < 999 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0) AS "M60+", IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.gender = 'F' AND (0 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() ) < 20 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0) AS "F0-19", IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.gender = 'F' AND (20 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() ) < 60 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0) AS "F20-59", IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.gender = 'F' AND (60 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(fin.year,'-',fin.month,'-',fin.day) ), CURDATE() ) < 999 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0) AS "F60+" FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no as patient, d.year_of_birth as year, d.month_of_birth as month, d.date_of_birth as day, d.sex as gender FROM demographic d WHERE d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} ) fin;

column.name: IF( COUNT(d.demographic_no) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (d.sex = 'M' AND (0 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() ) < 5 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0)
column.title: M0-4

column.name: IF( COUNT(d.demographic_no) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (d.sex = 'M' AND (5 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() ) < 10 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0)

column.name: IF( COUNT(d.demographic_no) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (d.sex = 'F' AND (105 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() ) < 110 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0)
column.title: F105-109

column.name: IF( COUNT(d.demographic_no) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (d.sex = 'F' AND (110 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() ) < 115 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0)

column.name: IF( COUNT(d.demographic_no) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (d.sex = 'F' AND (115 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() ) < 120 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0)

column.name: IF( COUNT(d.demographic_no) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (d.sex = 'F' AND (120 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() ) < 125 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0)
column.title: F120-124

column.name: IF( COUNT(d.demographic_no) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (d.sex = 'F' AND (125 <= TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() )) AND (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,'-',d.month_of_birth,'-',d.date_of_birth) ), CURDATE() ) < 999 )) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 0)
column.title: F125+
